name: The Seed of Love
description:
A visual novel about love, and separation. And plants.

There are a lot of love stories out there. This is another like those. Nothing special about it. Maybe a little special, but that is up to you to decide. Every story seems to look the same from afar, but when looked up close, they all seem unique.

Like this girl, after all.

I was never good at having care of plants. I think I'm not just one of those people. So when I actually got this little present from someone special, I knew I had to take care of it. And maybe learn how to grow to love someone, too.

Lasts about 15 minutes, and has 3 unlockable endings.

Hope you will enjoy it.
